alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:19PM CDT until April 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. CHARLES...SOUTHERN LINCOLN AND NORTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 419 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wright City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported golf ball size hail north of Warrenton . IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Wentzville, Troy, Warrenton, Wright City, St. Paul, Moscow Mills, Hawk Point, Fountain N` Lakes, Chain of Rocks, Flint Hill, Foristell, and Cave. This also includes Cuivre River State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 199 and 200. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
